EmailTemplate.name: 5Apr13Web:Gen-X.We Missed You Feb21
EmailTemplate.subject: Since You Missed it - Resources from our Gen X Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at our “Working to Live, Not Living to Work: Five Insights into the Gen X Workforce" webinar held on Thursday, April 4. Steve King and Carolyn Ockels, Partners at Emergent Research, explained how Gen X is leading the move to independent work in America. Although you were not able to attend, we appreciate your interest. Below you will find links to the webinar resources. We hope you find them informative: Recorded webinar <http://f5159bf2f10bd6337d85-21700ed84a5e5d3baebf7221604c63ee.r66.cf2.rackcdn.com/2013-04-04-Working_to_Live_Not_Living_to_Work.mp4> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Gen_X_Webinar_Slides.pptx> Gen X Report PDF <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_2013_Gen-X_Report.pdf>
